body.name: Dream On Me Jayden 4-in-1 Mini Convertible Crib And Changer in White, Greenguard Gold Certified, Non-Toxic Finish, New Zealand Pinewood, 1" Mattress Pad
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 18 hrs 13 mins
features: CONVERTIBILITY OPTIONS: The Jayden 4-in-1 Mini Convertible Crib and Changer grows along with your child. Starting as a crib, you can convert it into a mini daybed and twin-size bed (bed rails sold separately) . Its compact size makes it ideal for small spaces

GRACEFUL DESIGN: Built of New Zealand pinewood, it boasts minimalist design features- gentle, smooth arches and sturdy spade feet. It is available in 6 beautiful water based paints/non toxic finishes allowing you to mix and match with any nursery theme .

FEATURE-HEAVY CHANGING TABLE: The Jayden comes with a detachable 3-drawer changing table, equipped with a changing pad and restraining strap with an easy release buckle to keep your baby safely secured. Keep baby essentials handy and neatly organized in the 3 roomy drawers
MATTRESS COMPATIBILITY - Comes with 1 OEM Mattress pad. For additional aftermarket mattress purchase, we recommend any Dream On Me, non-toxic, Greenguard certified mini crib mattress.

PRIORITIZING SAFETY: All Dream On Me cribs meet/exceed applicable ASTM and CPSC standards Product dimensions are 56.75L x 29W x 41H inches Max weight limit 50 lbs All tools/assembly instructions included
body.description: Product Description The Dream On Me Jayden Convertible 4-in-1 Mini Crib & Changer effortlessly blends style with utility. It meets the growing needs of your child as it converts it from a mini crib to mini daybed and twin-size bed (bed rails sold separately). It also features a detachable three-drawer changing table. The mix of compact size and utility makes it ideal for smaller spaces. The changing table is equipped with a changing pad and restraining strap with an easy release buckle to secure the baby safely. NOTE: The changing table can be used as a standalone piece only in twin bed conversion mode. Keep baby essentials handy in the 3 drawers! Built of New Zealand pinewood, its minimalist design features gentle, smooth arches & sturdy spade feet. It comes in six striking non toxic finishes allowing it to blend beautifully with any nursery theme. It also has a convenient 3-position, adjustable mattress support system. Our mini cribs come with the regulatory one inch mattress pad and we recommend the Dream On Me non-toxic, Greenguard Gold certified mini or portable crib mattress for the perfect fit. All tools/assembly instructions included. All our cribs are designed with a focus on safety, and meet all applicable ASTM/CPSC standards. Product dimensions are 56.75L x 29W x 41H inches, maximum weight limit is 50 lbs. From the Manufacturer The Jayden 2 in 1 from Dream on Me is a beautifully constructed, rugged, multipurpose portable crib and changer. Comes standard with non dropsied rail system for safety, two level mattress support, 1" mattress pad and attached changing table with 3 large storage drawers. The changing table is equipped with a changing pad and restraining strap with easy release buckle to secure baby safely in place. It is the perfect alternative for small spaces without giving up fashion, function or safety. Once your child has outgrown the crib, the changing table is detachable and this portable crib can be converted to a twin bed with optional bedrails (sold separately). Accommodates a Dream On Me 3" portable crib mattress, (sold separately). Do not use power tools to assemble this product which can cause the wood to splinter. Tools required for assembly are included with the item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!! Excellent crib!!
reviews.reviewText: This beautiful and high quality crib is exactly what I was looking for. Safe and sturdy crib for my baby. Changing table and drawers attached to crib makes it so convenient. In addition, great customer service. I had trouble with some parts and customer service representative went above and beyond to help me with it. Definitely recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars it’s good for the price
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I absolutely love this crib now that it is all put together. The first crib that was sent arrived defective so the replacement crib they sent me worked great took 3 days to put together very complex design. it was frustrating because a few pieces did crack but the manufacturer sent me replacement parts. So glad it is all ready now for my son! Love the crib now. I used it for a lot of storage of diapers but to be honest if you are looking for a very easy assembly this crib isn’t for you. you must have patience to install this crib. I’m giving it a 4 because in the end i I love with the crib for the price and for the way it fits perfectly in my bedroom how i feel it is safe now for my baby. Would give a 5 but I am being honest about the frustrations i had with the very first crib.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s ok but I wish I would’ve bought a different crib
reviews.reviewText: So the crib is good it’s sturdy and was easy to put together it’s light weight so it’s easy to move around if needed. However it is super small I didn’t think it was going to be as small as it actually is. My son didn’t fit in the changing table when he was 4 months so we couldn’t change him on it anymore after 4 months he was to long and could barely fit in it. He’s now 17 months old I had to lower the crib as low as it goes and he’s almost able to get over it. When he lays down he’s almost as long as the crib. I know it said mini but again didn’t realize it was pretty much for a doll. It says it’s able to change and you can make it into different beds like a day bed twin size bed etc. but you have to buy they extra pieces and I still haven’t found the correct pieces for it yet. I’ve tried to contact that company itself but never heard back from them. So my son usually sleeps in a playpen because he seems to be so big. Oh also the mattress they give is absolutely insane I’m not sure why they even bother it’s the most thinnest piece I’ve ever seen it’s more like a changing table pad not a mattress so I had to actually buy a mattress for the crib.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful but can’t find a changing pad:(
reviews.reviewText: This is a beautiful mini Crib, and there are several options for a mattress but the only thing I don’t like is, I cannot find a changing pad that will fit this changing table. Have ordered two different ones and neither one of them fit. If anyone has had success, please let me know.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great size crib but do have some chips here and there
reviews.reviewText: I loved the size of the product especially if your room sharing with your baby . The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars because the mattress pad is very thin so you would have to buy a mattress separately. There were pieces of furniture that had chips on them. But the crib itself is beautiful

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I would not recommend a mini crib
reviews.reviewText: I bought this crib because it had such versatility, a changing station with a railing and drawers, and it's aesthetically cute. This was a rookie first time mom mistake. I didn't realize how different a MINI crib is to a regular crib. The crib is tiny and I anticipate my daughter growing out of it quickly. My kiddo always rotates 360 degrees in her sleep and the width of this tiny thing is not enough for her not to bonk her head a bunch of times in the process. It's only slightly larger than her bassinet was. Also, it doesn't come with a mattress so you have to purchase a mini crib mattress with the correct dimensions. I also didn't realize the changing station is a fairly small size so I can't even use it for my 7 month old now, as it is just too small. It would be fine for a newborn but we never ended up using it because our pack and play changing station was bigger and more comfortable. My husband said it wasn't too difficult to put together at least. All in all, I would recommend buying a full size crib for your baby. This is as advertised so it's not the sellers fault, but I wish I had done more research before purchasing and I wouldn't recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We bought this crib since the nursery is smaller and I’m questioning why I didn’t get this with my second child! We had the same crib but regular size not mini and this is way more realistic in what size a baby needs. The drawers are nice and go in easily since the tracks are preinstalled and I did put my own knobs on but the ones it comes with would be just fine if I didn’t have my own. The instructions were nice and easy and the pieces came undamaged and packaged really well.
